member.name: IStreamAsync.CancelIo
member.summary: Marks all pending input/output (I/O) operations as canceled.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStreamAsync.OverlappedResult
member.summary: Retrieves the results of an overlapped operation.
member.param: A pointer to the structure that was specified when the overlapped operation was started.
When this method returns, contains the number of bytes that were actually transferred by a read or write operation.
If TRUE the method does not return until the operation has been completed. If FALSE and an operation is pending, the method returns the HRESULT equivalent to ERROR_IO_INCOMPLETE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStreamAsync.ReadAsync
member.summary: Reads information from a stream asynchronously. For example, the Shell implements this interface on file items when transferring them asynchronously.
member.param: When this method returns successfully, returns a buffer that is cb bytes long and contains pcbRead bytes of information from the read operation.
The number of bytes to read from the stream.
Pointer to a DWORD value that, when this method returns successfully, states the actual number of bytes read to the buffer pointed to by pv. This value can be NULL.
A pointer to an structure that contains information used in the asynchronous read operation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStreamAsync.WriteAsync
member.summary: Writes information to a stream asynchronously. For example, the Shell implements this method on file items when transferring them asynchronously.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer of size cb bytes that contains the information to be written to the stream.
The size of the buffer pointed to by lpBuffer, in bytes.
Pointer to a DWORD value that, when the method returns successfully, states the actual number of bytes written to the stream. This value can be NULL if this information is not needed.
A pointer to an structure that contains information used in the asynchronous write operation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStreamAsync
member.summary: Exposes methods to manage input/output (I/O) to an asynchronous stream.
